mapper.select: select A.*, (select code_desc1 from sh_code B where A.item_category = B.code_no and B.code_type ='item_category') as item_category_desc, (select code_desc1 from sh_code B where A.item_state = B.code_no and B.code_type ='item_state') as item_state_desc from sh_product A
mapper.insert: insert into sh_product (item_no, item_name, item_price, item_category, item_desc, item_date, item_state) select concat('0', cast(max(item_no)+1 as char)), #{itemName}, #{itemPrice}, (select code_no from sh_code where code_desc1 = #{itemCategory}), #{itemDesc}, now(), (select code_no from sh_code where code_desc1 = #{itemState}) from sh_product where item_category = (select code_no from sh_code where code_desc1 = #{itemCategory})
mapper.select: select item_no, item_name, item_price, (select code_desc1 from sh_code where code_type ='item_category' and code_no = P.item_category) as item_category, item_desc, item_date, (select code_desc1 from sh_code where code_type ='item_state' and code_no = P.item_state) as item_state from sh_product P where item_no=#{itemNo}
mapper.update: update sh_product set item_name=#{itemName}, item_price =${itemPrice}, item_category = (select code_no from sh_code where code_type ='item_category' and code_desc1 =#{itemCategory}), item_desc = #{itemDesc}, item_state = (select code_no from sh_code where code_type ='item_state' and code_desc1 = #{itemState}) where item_no = #{itemNo}
mapper.select: select ss.*, sp.item_price , (select code_desc1 from sh_code sc where code_type='item_category' and code_no = sp.item_category) as item_category, (select code_desc1 from sh_code sc where code_type='item_state' and code_no = sp.item_state) as item_state from sh_stock ss, sh_product sp where shop_no =#{shopNo} and ss.item_no = sp.item_no order by item_cnt desc, item_no asc

SELECT sp.*, sc1.code_desc1 as code_category , sc2.code_desc1 as code_state FROM sh_product sp LEFT JOIN sh_stock ss ON sp.item_no = ss.item_no AND ss.shop_no = #{shopNo} LEFT JOIN sh_code sc1 ON sc1.code_type = 'item_category' AND sc1.code_no = sp.item_category LEFT JOIN sh_code sc2 ON sc2.code_type = 'item_state' AND sc2.code_no = sp.item_state WHERE ss.item_no IS NULL order by sp.item_no asc
select code_no, code_desc1 from sh_code where code_type ='item_category'
select code_no,code_desc1 from sh_code where code_type ='item_state'
